Title: MercuryFE
Description: Frontend for arcade cabinets written in C# - utilising Sql Server CE, WPF, Linq and WinForms technology.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Frontend for arcade cabinets written in C# - utilising Sql Server CE, WPF, Linq and WinForms technology.

Credits

Just a quick mention of some brilliant .net components I've used (some with a little tweaking).
Property Grid Ex written by Danilo Corallo.
Input Simulator written by Michael Noonan.
HTML Agility Pack written by DarthObiwan
SharpZipLib
MAME interop written by MAME team, Howard Casto and Headkaze
Taglib Sharp originally written by Novell????
SlimDX

I originally was using Global Hook  (still in the source code), but am no longer using this due to the use of Direct X instead.

Current Issues

The frontend works, but is not complete. The image tiles are all over the place. This will hopefully be fixed soon.
Error handling throughout the code is incomplete.
Joystick support is incomplete and not tested. (Keyboard should be fine)

Disclaimer

I am not a .Net developer by trade. Any sloppy work or standards can and will be present. Comments on how to fix these are welcome!
